summary: At the beginning of the 20th century, Claude Roc, a young middle-class Frenchman meets in Paris Ann Brown, a young Englishwoman. They become friends and Ann invites him to spend holidays at... See full summary »
cast: Jean-Pierre Léaud|Kika Markham|Stacey Tendeter|Sylvia Marriott|Marie Mansart|Philippe Léotard|Irène Tunc|Mark Peterson|Georges Delerue|Marie Iracane|Marcel Berbert|Jeanne Lobre|David Markham|Sophie Baker|René Gaillard|Anne Levaslot|Annie Miller|Christine Pellé|Guillaume Schiffman|Mathieu Schiffman|Jeanne Sophie|Eva Truffaut|François Truffaut|Laura Truffaut
title: Las dos inglesas y el amor
